title: Tensor Abelian geometry of VI-modules
summary: In this short note, we study the spectrum of prime Serre ideals of global represen tations for noetherian families. In particular, we prove that the spectrum of prime Serre ideals of finitely generated VI-modules is homeomorphic to N^{*}, the one-point compactification of N, which differs from the Balmer spectrum of derived VI-modules. Our method could also be applied to the category of finitely generated FI-modules and the category of global representations for the family of cyclic p-groups.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了诺特族全局表示的素Serre理想谱，证明了有限生成VI-模的素Serre理想谱同胚于N的单点紧化N*，这与导出VI-模的Balmer谱不同。
AI.motivation: 研究诺特族全局表示的素Serre理想谱结构，特别是比较有限生成VI-模的素Serre理想谱与导出VI-模的Balmer谱之间的差异。
AI.method: 采用谱理论方法研究素Serre理想，将方法应用于有限生成VI-模范畴，并扩展到有限生成FI-模范畴和循环p-群族的全局表示范畴。
AI.result: 证明了有限生成VI-模的素Serre理想谱同胚于N的单点紧化N*，这与导出VI-模的Balmer谱结构不同。
AI.conclusion: 诺特族全局表示的素Serre理想谱具有特定的拓扑结构，该方法可推广到其他相关范畴，为理解表示范畴的谱结构提供了新视角。

title: Composing $p$-adic qubits: from representations of SO(3)$_p$ to entanglement and universal quantum logic gates
comment: Codes accompanying the paper at the GitLAB repository https://gitlab.git.nrw/isvampa/composing-p-adic-qubits.git
summary: In the context of $p$-adic quantum mechanics, we investigate composite systems of $p$-adic qubits and $p$-adically controlled quantum logic gates. We build on the notion of a single $p$-adic qubit as a two-dimensional irreducible representation of the compact $p$-adic special orthogonal group SO(3)$_p$. We show that the classification of these representations reduces to the finite case, as they all factorise through some finite quotient SO(3)$_p$ mod $p^k$. Then, we tackle the problem of $p$-adic qubit composition and entanglement, fundamental for a $p$-adic formulation of quantum information processing. We classify the representations of SO(3)$_p$ mod $p$, and analyse tensor products of two $p$-adic qubit representations lifted from SO(3)$_p$ mod $p$. We solve the Clebsch-Gordan problem for such systems, revealing that the coupled bases decompose into singlet and doublet states. We further study entanglement arising from those stable subsystems. For $p=3$, we construct a set of gates from $4$-dimensional irreducible representations of SO(3)$_p$ mod $p$ that we prove to be universal for quantum computation.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了p进量子力学中的复合系统，包括p进量子比特和p进控制量子逻辑门，解决了p进量子比特的表示分类、纠缠问题，并针对p=3构建了通用量子计算门集。
AI.motivation: 研究p进量子力学中的复合系统和量子信息处理，为p进量子计算建立理论基础，解决p进量子比特的表示、纠缠和量子门构造问题。
AI.method: 基于p进特殊正交群SO(3)_p的二维不可约表示定义p进量子比特，通过有限商SO(3)_p mod p^k进行分类，分析张量积表示，解决Clebsch-Gordan问题，研究纠缠结构，并为p=3构造4维不可约表示的门集。
AI.result: 证明了p进量子比特表示可约化为有限情况，解决了双量子比特系统的Clebsch-Gordan问题（分解为单重态和双重态），分析了纠缠子系统，并为p=3构建了通用量子计算门集。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为p进量子信息处理建立了理论基础，解决了p进量子比特的表示分类、纠缠和量子门构造问题，为p进量子计算的实际实现提供了数学框架。

title: Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie bialgebras and differential Lie bialgebras
summary: In this paper, we first introduce the concept of Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie algebras. We then establish the equivalence relations between the Manin triples of Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie algebras, Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie bialgebras, and matched pairs of Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie algebras. Furthermore, we show that such an equivalence also holds for differential Lie bialgebras, together with their associated Manin triples and corresponding matched pairs.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入了Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie代数概念，并建立了其Manin三元组、Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie双代数以及匹配对之间的等价关系，同时证明这种等价性也适用于微分Lie双代数及其相关结构。
AI.motivation: 研究Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie代数及其相关结构的理论框架，探索不同数学结构之间的内在联系和等价关系，为相关代数理论的发展提供新的视角和工具。
AI.method: 首先引入Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie代数的概念，然后建立其Manin三元组、Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie双代数以及匹配对之间的等价关系，最后将这种等价性推广到微分Lie双代数及其相关结构。
AI.result: 成功证明了Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie代数的Manin三元组、双代数结构和匹配对之间存在等价关系，并且这种等价性同样适用于微分Lie双代数体系。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为Nijenhuis BiHom-Lie代数理论建立了完整的等价关系框架，揭示了不同代数结构之间的深刻联系，为后续相关研究提供了理论基础。

title: Locally analytic vectors in the completed cohomology of quaternionic Shimura curves
summary: We use the methods introduced by Lue Pan to study the locally analytic vectors of the completed cohomology of Shimura curves associated to an indefinite quaternion algebra $D$ which is ramified at a prime number $p$. Let $D_p^{\times}$ be the group of units of $D$ at $p$. Using $p$-adic uniformization of the quaternionic Shimura curves, we compute the Hecke eigenspace of the completed cohomology with the Hecke eigenvalues associated to a classical automorphic form on another quaternion algebra $\bar D$ (switching invariants of $D$ at $p,\infty$). We present this locally analytic $D_p^\times$-representation using the de Rham complex of the Lubin-Tate tower of dimension $1$. This is analogous to the Breuil-Strauch conjecture for the group $\mathrm{GL}_2(\mathbb{Q}_p)$. We show that the locally analytic $D_p^{\times}$-representation does not detect the Hodge filtration of the local de Rham Galois representation at $p$ in the crystalline case, and also give applications for the locally analytic Jacquet--Langlands correspondence for $\mathrm{GL}_2(\mathbb{Q}_p)$ and $D_p^\times$.

AI.tldr: 该论文使用Lue Pan的方法研究了一个在素数p处分歧的不定四元数代数D相关的Shimura曲线的完备上同调的局部解析向量。通过p进一致化技术，计算了与另一个四元数代数上经典自守形式相关的Hecke特征值的Hecke特征空间，并用一维Lubin-Tate塔的de Rham复形表示该局部解析表示。结果与GL₂(ℚₚ)的Breuil-Strauch猜想类似，并应用于局部解析Jacquet-Langlands对应。
AI.motivation: 研究Shimura曲线的完备上同调的局部解析向量结构，特别是与四元数代数相关的表示理论。通过p进一致化方法，探索局部解析表示与经典自守形式、Hecke算子以及Galois表示之间的关系，为理解p进局部Langlands对应和Jacquet-Langlands对应提供新的视角。
AI.method: 1. 使用Lue Pan引入的方法研究局部解析向量；2. 利用p进一致化技术计算四元数Shimura曲线的完备上同调；3. 计算与另一个四元数代数上经典自守形式相关的Hecke特征值的Hecke特征空间；4. 使用一维Lubin-Tate塔的de Rham复形表示局部解析Dₚ×-表示；5. 分析该表示与局部de Rham Galois表示的Hodge过滤关系。
AI.result: 1. 成功计算了完备上同调的Hecke特征空间，该空间与在p和无穷远点交换不变量的另一个四元数代数上的经典自守形式相关；2. 用一维Lubin-Tate塔的de Rham复形表示了局部解析Dₚ×-表示；3. 证明了在结晶情形下，该局部解析表示不检测局部de Rham Galois表示在p处的Hodge过滤；4. 为GL₂(ℚₚ)和Dₚ×的局部解析Jacquet-Langlands对应提供了应用。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了四元数代数相关Shimura曲线的完备上同调的局部解析表示理论框架，揭示了局部解析表示与经典自守形式、Hecke算子以及Galois表示之间的深刻联系。所得结果与GL₂(ℚₚ)的Breuil-Strauch猜想类似，为p进局部Langlands对应和Jacquet-Langlands对应的进一步研究提供了重要工具和视角。

title: Double Hall-Littlewood symmetric polynomials
summary: We establish a ring isomorphism between the derived Hall algebra of the Jordan quiver and the ring of double symmetric functions (i.e., the ring of symmetric polynomials in two sets of countably many variables, invariant under the respective actions of their symmetric groups) with a parameter $t$. This isomorphism maps the derived Hall basis (the natural basis of the derived Hall algebra) to a class of double Hall-Littlewood (HL) symmetric functions, which are formulated via raising and lowering operators. These double HL functions are parameterized by bipartitions; they reduce to the classical HL functions when one of the partitions is empty, and specialize to Schur Laurent symmetric functions at $t = 0$. We also derive the Pieri rules for these double HL functions. Additionally, we obtain several natural generating functions for the derived Hall algebra as well as their transition relations, which can be transferred to the ring of double symmetric functions via the established ring isomorphism.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了Jordan箭图的导出Hall代数与带参数t的双对称函数环之间的环同构，将导出Hall基映射到一类由提升和下降算子定义的双Hall-Littlewood对称函数。
AI.motivation: 研究Jordan箭图的导出Hall代数与对称函数理论之间的联系，探索导出Hall代数在对称函数环中的具体实现，建立两个数学结构之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 通过构造环同构，将导出Hall代数映射到双对称函数环，定义参数化双Hall-Littlewood对称函数，使用提升和下降算子公式化这些函数，并推导Pieri规则。
AI.result: 成功建立了导出Hall代数与双对称函数环的环同构，将导出Hall基映射到双Hall-Littlewood函数，推导了Pieri规则，获得了导出Hall代数的生成函数及其转换关系。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了导出Hall代数与对称函数理论之间的深刻联系，为两个领域提供了新的视角和工具，所得结果可通过环同构在双对称函数环中应用。

title: Quantum Entanglement, Stratified Spaces, and Topological Matter: Towards an Entanglement-Sensitive Langlands Correspondence
summary: Recently, quantum entanglement has been presented as a cohomological obstruction to reconstructing a global quantum state from locally compatible information, where sheafification provides a functor that is forgetful with regards to global-from-local signatures while acting faithfully with respect to within-patch multipartite structures. Nontrivial connections to Hecke modifications and the geometric Langlands program are explored in the process. The aim of this work is to validate and extend a number of the claims made in [arXiv:2511.04326] through both theoretical analysis and numerical simulations, employing concrete perspectives from condensed matter physics.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过凝聚态物理视角验证并扩展了量子纠缠作为全局量子态重构的障碍的理论，探索了与Hecke修正和几何Langlands计划的联系
AI.motivation: 验证和扩展arXiv:2511.04326中的主张，通过理论分析和数值模拟，从凝聚态物理的具体视角探讨量子纠缠作为全局量子态重构障碍的理论
AI.method: 采用理论分析和数值模拟相结合的方法，从凝聚态物理的具体视角出发，运用层化（sheafification）作为函子来研究局部兼容信息重构全局量子态的障碍
AI.result: 验证了量子纠缠作为同调障碍在全局量子态重构中的作用，探索了与Hecke修正和几何Langlands计划的非平凡联系，为相关理论提供了实证支持
AI.conclusion: 量子纠缠确实构成了从局部信息重构全局量子态的同调障碍，层化函子在保持局部结构的同时忽略了全局特征，这一发现与Hecke修正和几何Langlands计划有深刻联系

title: Ribbon complexes for the 0-Hecke algebra
summary: We construct explicit tableau-level maps between indecomposable projective modules for the type A 0-Hecke algebra that assemble into canonical split short exact sequences lifting the basic ribbon product rule in NSym via concatenation and near-concatenation. Iterating these maps yields cochain complexes indexed by generalized ribbons; we prove these complexes are acyclic in positive degrees and that their zeroth cohomology is the projective module indexed by full concatenation. We apply these complexes, together with VandeBogert's ribbon Schur module criterion, to prove Koszulness for a naturally defined internally graded algebra object built from the 0-Hecke tower. Finally, we define skew projective modules whose noncommutative Frobenius characteristics realize skewing by fundamental quasisymmetric functions on NSym.

AI.tldr: 本文在A型0-Hecke代数中构建了不可分解投射模之间的显式映射，这些映射组装成规范分裂短正合序列，通过拼接和近拼接提升NSym中的基本ribbon积规则。迭代这些映射得到由广义ribbon索引的上链复形，证明这些复形在正次数处无圈且零次上同调是完整拼接索引的投射模。应用这些复形和VandeBogert的ribbon Schur模判据，证明由0-Hecke塔构建的自然内部分次代数对象的Koszul性。最后定义斜投射模，其非交换Frobenius特征实现NSym上基本拟对称函数的斜化作用。
AI.motivation: 研究0-Hecke代数中投射模的结构及其与NSym（非交换对称函数环）的关系，探索ribbon积规则在代数表示论中的提升，构建复形工具来研究代数对象的同调性质，特别是Koszul性。
AI.method: 1. 构造显式的tableau-level映射连接不可分解投射模；2. 将这些映射组装成规范分裂短正合序列；3. 通过迭代映射构建由广义ribbon索引的上链复形；4. 证明复形的无圈性和零次上同调性质；5. 应用VandeBogert的ribbon Schur模判据；6. 定义斜投射模并研究其Frobenius特征。
AI.result: 1. 成功构建了连接0-Hecke代数投射模的显式映射和分裂短正合序列；2. 证明了广义ribbon索引复形在正次数处无圈，且零次上同调对应完整拼接的投射模；3. 证明了由0-Hecke塔构建的内部分次代数对象是Koszul的；4. 定义了斜投射模，其非交换Frobenius特征实现基本拟对称函数的斜化作用。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了0-Hecke代数表示论与NSym之间的深刻联系，通过构建显式映射和复形工具，不仅揭示了ribbon积规则在代数表示中的提升，还为研究代数对象的同调性质提供了新方法，特别是证明了相关代数结构的Koszul性，拓展了非交换对称函数理论在表示论中的应用。

title: Character degrees in $2$-blocks of $\mathfrak{S}_n$ and $\mathfrak{A}_n$
summary: Let $p$ be an odd prime. We show that for sufficiently large $n$, every $2$-block of $\mathfrak{S}_n$ and $\mathfrak{A}_n$ contains an ordinary irreducible character of degree divisible by $p$. For almost all $2$-blocks of $\mathfrak{A}_n$, we classify whether it contains a rational valued ordinary irreducible character of degree divisible by $p$.

AI.tldr: 对于足够大的n，对称群和交错群的每个2-块都包含一个次数能被奇素数p整除的普通不可约特征标；对于交错群的大部分2-块，分类了是否包含次数能被p整除的有理值普通不可约特征标。
AI.motivation: 研究对称群和交错群的模表示理论，特别是2-块中普通不可约特征标的性质，探索特征标次数与素数整除性的关系。
AI.method: 使用组合表示论和模表示论的方法，分析对称群和交错群的2-块结构，通过特征标理论和分区组合学来研究特征标次数的整除性质。
AI.result: 证明对于足够大的n，对称群和交错群的每个2-块都包含次数能被奇素数p整除的普通不可约特征标；对交错群的大部分2-块，给出了是否包含次数能被p整除的有理值普通不可约特征标的分类结果。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了对称群和交错群2-块中特征标次数的整除性质，为有限群的模表示理论提供了新的结构信息，特别关注了有理值特征标的存在性问题。

title: Semi-infinite Lakshmibai--Seshadri paths and level-zero extremal weight modules over twisted quantum affine algebras
summary: In this paper, we study level-zero extremal weight modules over twisted quantum affine algebras. To this end, we introduce semi-infinite Lakshmibai--Seshadri paths associated with a level-zero dominant integral weight $λ$. We then show that the set $\tfrac{\infty}{2}\mathrm{LS}(λ)$ of semi-infinite LS paths of shape $λ$ is isomorphic, as a crystal, to the crystal basis $\mathcal{B}(λ)$ of the corresponding level-zero extremal weight module $V(λ)$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了扭曲量子仿射代数的零级极值权模，引入了与零级主导积分权λ相关的半无限LS路径，并证明了这些路径的集合与相应零级极值权模的晶体基同构。
AI.motivation: 研究扭曲量子仿射代数的零级极值权模的晶体结构，为理解这类代数表示理论提供新的几何组合工具。
AI.method: 引入与零级主导积分权λ相关的半无限Lakshmibai-Seshadri路径，建立路径集合与晶体基之间的同构关系。
AI.result: 证明了半无限LS路径集合$\tfrac{\infty}{2}\mathrm{LS}(λ)$与零级极值权模$V(λ)$的晶体基$\mathcal{B}(λ)$作为晶体是同构的。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了扭曲量子仿射代数零级极值权模的晶体基与半无限LS路径之间的对应关系，为这类代数的表示理论提供了新的几何组合描述。

title: Igusa-Todorov properties of recollements of abelian categories
summary: In this paper, we investigate the behavior of Igusa-Todorov properties under recollements of abelian categories. In particular, we study how the Igusa-Todorov distances of the categories involved in a recollement are related. Applications are given to Artin algebras, especially to Morita context rings.

AI.tldr: 研究Igusa-Todorov性质在阿贝尔范畴recollement下的行为，特别是探讨recollement中各个范畴的Igusa-Todorov距离之间的关系，并将其应用于Artin代数和Morita context环
AI.motivation: 研究Igusa-Todorov性质在范畴recollement结构中的行为，这对于理解同调代数中的这些重要性质在不同范畴结构间的传递和关系具有重要意义
AI.method: 通过阿贝尔范畴的recollement理论框架，分析Igusa-Todorov距离在recollement中的三个范畴（中心范畴、左范畴、右范畴）之间的数学关系
AI.result: 建立了recollement中各个范畴Igusa-Todorov距离之间的具体关系，并将这些理论结果应用于Artin代数和Morita context环的具体代数结构
AI.conclusion: Igusa-Todorov性质在阿贝尔范畴的recollement结构中表现出特定的关系模式，这些结果为Artin代数和Morita context环的同调性质研究提供了新的工具和视角

title: The $\ell$-modular local theta correspondence in type II and partial permutations
summary: In this paper we compute the multiplicities appearing in the ${\overline{\mathbb{F}}_\ell}$-modular theta correspondence in type II over a non-archimedean field $\mathrm{F}$, where $\ell$ is a prime not dividing the residue cardinality of $\mathrm{F}$. Unlike for representations with complex coefficients, highly non-trivial multiplicities can emerge. We show that these multiplicities are precisely governed by the action of symmetric groups on the set of partial permutations, and the ${\overline{\mathbb{F}}_\ell}$-representation of symmetric groups these give rise to. The problem is thus reduced to certain branching problems in the modular representation theory of symmetric groups. In particular, if $d$ is the order of the residue cardinality of $\mathrm{F}$ in ${\overline{\mathbb{F}}_\ell}$, and the rank of the involved general linear groups is bounded above by $ d\ell$, the behavior of the theta correspondence can be predicted via explicit algorithms coming from Pieri's Formula.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了非阿基米德域上模θ对应的重数问题，发现与复数系数表示不同，模表示会出现高度非平凡的重数，这些重数由对称群在部分置换集上的作用决定。
AI.motivation: 研究非阿基米德域上模θ对应的重数问题，因为与复数系数表示相比，模表示会出现高度非平凡的重数现象，需要深入理解其数学结构。
AI.method: 将θ对应的重数问题转化为对称群在部分置换集上的作用问题，进一步简化为对称群模表示理论中的分支问题。当一般线性群的秩有界时，使用Pieri公式的显式算法进行预测。
AI.result: 证明了θ对应的重数完全由对称群在部分置换集上的作用决定，这些作用产生了对称群的模表示。当秩满足特定条件时，可以通过Pieri公式的显式算法预测θ对应的行为。
AI.conclusion: 模θ对应的重数问题可以归结为对称群模表示理论中的分支问题，为理解这类模表示提供了系统的理论框架和计算方法。

title: On Multilinear Forms for Mod $p$ Representations of $\mathrm{GL}_2(\mathbb{Q}_p)$
summary: Motivated by the study of trilinear forms for complex representations, we investigate the space of $G$-invariant linear forms on tensor products of irreducible admissible representations of $G = \mathrm{GL}_2(\mathbb{Q}_p)$ over $\overline{\mathbb{F}}_p$. Our main result is a complete vanishing theorem: for any $n \ge 1$ and $n$ infinite-dimensional irreducible admissible representations $π_1,\dots,π_n$ of $G$, \[ \operatorname{Hom}_G(π_1 \otimes \cdots \otimes π_n, \mathbb{1}) = 0. \] A refined version holds for $B^+ := \begin{pmatrix} p^{\mathbb{Z}} & \mathbb{Q}_p \\ 0 & 1 \end{pmatrix}$-invariant forms when at least one $π_i$ is supersingular. The proof proceeds by a detailed analysis of certain subgroups, reducing the problem from $G$ to $B^+$ and ultimately to the representation theory of $\mathbb{Z}_p$. We also deduce partial extensions of the result to $\mathrm{GL}_2(F)$ for finite extensions $F/\mathbb{Q}_p$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了GL₂(ℚₚ)在特征p域上的不可约容许表示的张量积上的G-不变线性形式，证明了完全消失定理：对于任意n个无限维不可约容许表示，其G-不变线性形式空间为零。
AI.motivation: 研究复数表示的三线性形式，探索GL₂(ℚₚ)在特征p域上的不可约容许表示的张量积上的不变线性形式空间。
AI.method: 通过对特定子群的详细分析，将问题从G约化到B⁺，最终约化到ℤₚ的表示理论。证明过程包括对B⁺-不变形式的精细分析，特别是当至少一个表示是超奇异时的情况。
AI.result: 主要结果是完全消失定理：对于任意n≥1和n个无限维不可约容许表示π₁,...,πₙ，Hom_G(π₁⊗⋯⊗πₙ, 𝟙)=0。当至少一个π_i是超奇异时，对B⁺-不变形式有更精细的版本。还将结果部分推广到GL₂(F)，其中F/ℚₚ是有限扩张。
AI.conclusion: 论文建立了GL₂(ℚₚ)在特征p域上的不可约容许表示的张量积上的不变线性形式的完全消失定理，为相关表示论研究提供了重要工具，并展示了向更一般群的部分推广可能性。

title: Weyl Mutations in Quiver Yangians
summary: The problem of solving non-linear equations would be considerably simplified by a possibility to convert known solutions into the new ones. This could seem an element of art, but in the context of ADHM-like equations describing quiver varieties there is a systematic approach. In this note we study moduli spaces and dualities of quiver gauge theories associated to effective dynamics of D-branes compactified on Calabi-Yau resolutions. We concentrate on a subfamily of quivers $\mathfrak{Q}_{\mathfrak{g}}$ covering Dynkin diagrams for simple Lie algebras $\mathfrak{g}$, where the respective BPS algebra is expected to be the Yangian algebra $Y(\mathfrak{g})$. For Yangians labeled by quivers their representations are described by solutions of ADHM-like equations. As quivers substitute Dynkin diagrams a generalization of the Weyl group $\mathcal{W}_{\mathfrak{g}}$ acts on the ADHM solutions. Here we work with the case $\mathfrak{g}=\mathfrak{sl}_{n+1}$ and treat this group as a group of electro-magnetic Seiberg-like dualities (we call them Weyl mutations) on the respective quiver gauge theories. We lift it to the case of higher representations associated to rectangular Young diagrams. An action of Weyl mutations on the BPS Yangian algebra is also discussed.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了与D-膜在Calabi-Yau紧化上有效动力学相关的箭图规范理论的模空间和对偶性，重点关注覆盖简单李代数Dynkin图的箭图子族，其中BPS代数预期为Yangian代数Y(g)。
AI.motivation: 研究非线性方程求解问题，探索将已知解转化为新解的系统方法。在描述箭图簇的ADHM型方程背景下，存在系统化方法。通过研究箭图规范理论的模空间和对偶性，特别是与简单李代数Dynkin图相关的箭图子族，可以更好地理解BPS代数结构。
AI.method: 集中研究箭图子族Q_g，覆盖简单李代数g的Dynkin图。将Weyl群W_g推广为作用于ADHM解的电-磁Seiberg型对偶群（称为Weyl突变）。具体处理g=sl_{n+1}情况，并将其提升到与矩形Young图相关的高维表示情况。
AI.result: 建立了箭图替代Dynkin图时，推广的Weyl群W_g作用于ADHM解的关系。将Weyl群视为箭图规范理论上的电-磁Seiberg型对偶群（Weyl突变）。讨论了Weyl突变对BPS Yangian代数的作用。
AI.conclusion: 通过研究箭图规范理论的模空间和对偶性，特别是Weyl群作为电-磁对偶群的作用，为非线性方程求解提供了系统化方法。这种方法将已知解转化为新解，在ADHM型方程和Yangian代数表示的背景下具有重要理论意义。

title: Invariant Algebraic $D$-Modules on Semisimple and General Linear Groups: Classification and Tensor Categories
comment: Two theorems about tensor categories are added. Minor corrections and improvements
summary:
We study finite-rank left-translation invariant algebraic $D$-modules on complex affine algebraic groups. Using the standard description of these objects as left-invariant flat algebraic connections on the trivial vector bundle, modulo algebraic gauge transformations, we recast the classification problem as an explicit moduli problem for constant connections.
  Our main results treat the semisimple case and the general linear case. For a connected semisimple complex algebraic group, invariant $D$-modules are classified by representations of the finite central kernel of the simply connected cover, yielding an equivalence of tensor categories. For a general linear group, every invariant $D$-module is obtained by pullback along the determinant map, reducing the classification to the one-dimensional torus case and inducing a tensor equivalence with the corresponding invariant category on the torus.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究复仿射代数群上有限秩左平移不变代数D-模的分类问题，将其重新表述为常数联络的显式模问题，主要解决了半单群和一般线性群的情况。
AI.motivation: 研究复仿射代数群上有限秩左平移不变代数D-模的分类问题，这些对象可以描述为平凡向量丛上的左不变平坦代数联络模去代数规范变换。
AI.method: 将分类问题重新表述为常数联络的显式模问题，使用标准描述将这些对象视为平凡向量丛上的左不变平坦代数联络模去代数规范变换。
AI.result: 对于连通半单复代数群，不变D-模由单连通覆盖的有限中心核的表示分类，产生张量范畴的等价；对于一般线性群，每个不变D-模都通过行列式映射的拉回获得，将分类约化到一维环面情况。
AI.conclusion: 论文成功分类了复仿射代数群上有限秩左平移不变代数D-模，在半单群和一般线性群情况下建立了张量范畴的等价关系，为这类代数结构的分类提供了系统框架。

title: Calogero-Sutherland hyperbolic system and Heckman-Opdam $\mathfrak{gl}_n$ hypergeometric function
summary: We prove equivalence of two integral representations for the wave functions of hyperbolic Calogero-Sutherland system. For this we study two families of Baxter operators related to hyperbolic Calogero-Sutherland and rational Ruijsenaars models; the first one as a limit from hyperbolic Ruijsenaars system, while the second one independently. Besides, computing asymptotics of integral representations and also the value at zero point, we identify them with renormalized Heckman-Opdam $\mathfrak{gl}_n$ hypergeometric function.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了双曲Calogero-Sutherland系统波函数的两种积分表示等价性，通过研究相关Baxter算子，并将其与重正化的Heckman-Opdam超几何函数联系起来。
AI.motivation: 研究双曲Calogero-Sutherland系统波函数的积分表示等价性，建立不同可积系统之间的联系，特别是双曲Calogero-Sutherland模型与有理Ruijsenaars模型之间的关系。
AI.method: 通过两种方法研究Baxter算子：1) 从双曲Ruijsenaars系统取极限得到；2) 独立研究。同时计算积分表示的渐近行为和零点值，与重正化的Heckman-Opdam超几何函数进行识别。
AI.result: 证明了双曲Calogero-Sutherland系统波函数的两种积分表示等价，并成功将其识别为重正化的Heckman-Opdam 𝔤𝔩_n超几何函数。
AI.conclusion: 建立了双曲Calogero-Sutherland系统与有理Ruijsenaars模型之间的深刻联系，通过Baxter算子框架统一了不同可积系统的数学结构，为相关领域研究提供了新视角。

title: Entropy and polynomial entropy of derived autoequivalences of derived discrete algebras
summary: The aim of this paper is to calculate entropy in the sense of Dimitrov-Haiden-Katzarkov-Kontsevich and polynomial entropy as defined by Fan-Fu-Ouchi of derived autoequivalences of derived discrete algebras over an algebraically closed field.

AI.tldr: 计算离散代数上导出自等价函子的Dimitrov-Haiden-Katzarkov-Kontsevich熵和Fan-Fu-Ouchi多项式熵
AI.motivation: 研究导出范畴中自等价函子的熵概念，特别是针对离散代数的情况，旨在量化这些函子的复杂性或"混沌程度"
AI.method: 应用Dimitrov-Haiden-Katzarkov-Kontsevich熵理论和Fan-Fu-Ouchi多项式熵理论，针对代数闭域上的导出离散代数的导出自等价函子进行计算
AI.result: 论文计算了特定代数结构（导出离散代数）上导出自等价函子的两种熵值，为理解这些函子的动态行为提供了量化指标
AI.conclusion: 通过计算离散代数上导出自等价函子的熵，为研究导出范畴中函子的动态性质提供了新的工具和视角

title: Exceptional dual pair correspondences; case of real groups of split rank one
summary: Exceptional real groups have quaternionic forms of split rank 4 that contain dual pairs $G\times G'$, where $G'$ is the split Lie group of the type $G_2$, and $G$ a Lie group of split rank one. In this paper we restrict the minimal representation of the quaternionic group to the dual pair and prove some significant results for the resulting correspondence of representations.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了例外实群的拟四元数形式中G×G'对偶对的表示限制，其中G'是G2型分裂李群，G是分裂秩为1的李群
AI.motivation: 研究例外实群的拟四元数形式中特定对偶对的表示对应关系，探索最小表示在限制到对偶对时的性质
AI.method: 将拟四元数群的最小表示限制到对偶对G×G'，分析由此产生的表示对应关系
AI.result: 证明了对偶对表示限制的一些重要结果，建立了表示之间的对应关系
AI.conclusion: 通过限制最小表示到特定对偶对，获得了关于例外实群拟四元数形式中表示对应的有意义结果

title: Degenerations of families of bands and strings for gentle algebras
summary: Let $A$ be a gentle algebra. For every collection of string and band diagrammes, we consider the constructible subset of the variety of representations containing all modules with this underlying diagramme. We study degenerations of such sets. We show that these sets are defined by vectors of integers which we call $h$-vectors and which are related to a restricted version of the hom-order. We provide combinatorial criteria for the existence of a degeneration, involving the removal of an arrow or the resolving of a type of configuration called "reaching".

AI.tldr: 研究温和代数表示簇中特定图式子集的退化行为，通过h-向量和受限同态序建立组合判据
AI.motivation: 研究温和代数表示簇中特定图式子集的退化行为，探索表示理论中的组合结构
AI.method: 通过构造包含特定弦图和带图表示的子集，引入h-向量概念，建立与受限同态序的关系，提供涉及箭头移除和"到达"配置解析的组合判据
AI.result: 证明了这些子集可由h-向量定义，且退化存在性与组合条件相关，包括箭头移除和特定配置的解析
AI.conclusion: 温和代数表示簇中特定图式子集的退化行为可通过组合方法描述，h-向量和受限同态序为此提供了有效工具

title: Rationality patterns
comment: Final version. Section numbers were changed. The terminology "strongly'' was replaced with "strong'', for example, Definition 4.4.11 (3). Other minor typos were corrected. To appear in Journal of Algebra
summary: In this paper, we establish general categorical frameworks that extend Loewy's classification scheme for finite-dimensional real irreducible representations of groups and Borel--Tits' criterion for the existence of rational forms of representations of $\bar{F}\otimes_F G$ for a connected reductive algebraic group $G$ over a field $F$ of characteristic zero and its algebraic closure $\bar{F}$. We also discuss applications of these general formalisms to the theory of Harish-Chandra modules, specifically to classify irreducible Harish-Chandra modules over fields $F$ of characteristic zero and to identify smaller fields of definition of irreducible Harish-Chandra modules over $\bar{F}$, particularly in the case of cohomological irreducible essentially unitarizable modules.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了扩展Loewy分类方案和Borel-Tits准则的一般范畴框架，用于处理特征零域上的代数群表示，并应用于Harish-Chandra模的分类和定义域的缩小。
AI.motivation: 扩展Loewy对有限维实不可约群表示的分类方案，以及Borel-Tits关于代数群表示有理形式存在性的准则，为特征零域上的表示理论提供更一般的范畴框架。
AI.method: 建立一般范畴框架，将Loewy分类方案和Borel-Tits准则推广到更一般的代数群表示情形，特别是处理特征零域上的连通约化代数群及其代数闭包的张量积表示。
AI.result: 建立了扩展Loewy方案和Borel-Tits准则的一般范畴形式化框架，并将其应用于Harish-Chandra模理论，能够分类特征零域上的不可约Harish-Chandra模，并识别代数闭包上不可约Harish-Chandra模的更小定义域。
AI.conclusion: 所建立的范畴框架成功扩展了经典表示论结果，为Harish-Chandra模理论提供了新的工具，特别在分类和定义域缩小方面有重要应用，特别是对本质上酉化的上同调不可约模。

title: Canonical torus action on symplectic singularities
comment: v3: Upgraded math content, including the proofs of rank r=1 (quasi-regularity). Also with minor changes in the exposition
summary:
We show that any symplectic singularity lying on a smoothable projective symplectic variety locally admits a good action of an algebraic torus of dimension $r \geq 1$, which is canonical. Under mild assumptions, $r=1$ is also confirmed. In particular, it admits (canonical) good $\mathbb{C}^*$-action. This proves Kaledin's conjecture conditionally but in a substantially stronger form. Our key idea is to use Donaldson-Sun theory on local Kahler metrics in complex differential geometry to connect with the theory of Poisson deformations of symplectic varieties.
  For general symplectic singularities, we prove the same assertion -- namely, the existence of a canonical (local) torus action -- assuming that the Donaldson-Sun theory extends to such singularities along with suitable singular (hyper)Kahler metrics. Conversely, our results can be also used to study local behaviour of such metrics around the germ. For instance, we show that such singular hyperKahler metric around isolated singularity is close to a metric cone in a polynomial order, and satisfies $r=1$ i.e., has a good canonical (local) $\mathbb{C}^*$-action, as the complexification of the cone metric rescaling. Our theory also fits well to singularities on many hyperKahler reductions.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了任何位于可光滑化射影辛流形上的辛奇点局部上都容许一个维数r≥1的代数环面的规范好作用，在温和条件下确认r=1，从而有条件地证明了Kaledin猜想。核心思想是利用Donaldson-Sun理论和Poisson变形理论建立联系。
AI.motivation: 研究辛奇点的局部几何结构，特别是探索是否存在规范的环面作用，以解决Kaledin猜想并理解辛奇点与超凯勒度量之间的关系。
AI.method: 结合Donaldson-Sun理论（关于局部凯勒度量的复微分几何理论）和辛流形的Poisson变形理论，通过分析超凯勒度量在奇点附近的行为来证明规范环面作用的存在性。
AI.result: 证明了位于可光滑化射影辛流形上的辛奇点局部存在维数r≥1的规范代数环面好作用，在温和条件下r=1；对于一般辛奇点，在Donaldson-Sun理论可扩展的假设下同样成立；并证明了孤立奇点附近的超凯勒度量多项式阶接近度量锥。
AI.conclusion: 辛奇点局部上存在规范的环面作用，这有条件地证明了Kaledin猜想，并为研究超凯勒度量在奇点附近的行为提供了新工具，特别适用于超凯勒约化的奇点。

title: Consecutive Patterns, Kostant's Problem and Type $A_6$
comment: revised version accepted for publication in Int. J. Alg. Comput
summary: For a permutation $w$ in the symmetric group $\mathfrak{S}_{n}$, let $L(w)$ denote the simple highest weight module in the principal block of the BGG category $\mathcal{O}$ for the Lie algebra $\mathfrak{sl}_{n}(\mathbb{C})$. We first prove that $L(w)$ is Kostant negative whenever $w$ consecutively contains certain patterns. We then provide a complete answer to Kostant's problem in type $A_{6}$ and show that the indecomposability conjecture also holds in type $A_{6}$, that is, applying an indecomposable projective functor to a simple module outputs either an indecomposable module or zero.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了对称群中排列与李代数范畴O中简单最高权模的关系，证明了当排列包含特定模式时，对应的模是Kostant负的，并在A6型中完全解决了Kostant问题，验证了不可分解猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究对称群排列与李代数范畴O中简单最高权模的对应关系，特别是Kostant问题和不可分解猜想在类型A中的表现。Kostant问题涉及确定哪些简单最高权模的普遍包络代数作用是可逆的，而不可分解猜想则关注投射函子作用于简单模时的行为。
AI.method: 首先通过分析排列的模式特征，证明当排列连续包含某些特定模式时，对应的简单最高权模L(w)是Kostant负的。然后在A6型情况下，通过系统分析所有可能的排列情况，完全解决了Kostant问题，并验证了不可分解猜想。
AI.result: 1. 证明了当排列w连续包含某些特定模式时，对应的简单最高权模L(w)是Kostant负的。2. 在A6型中完全解决了Kostant问题，确定了所有简单最高权模的Kostant性质。3. 验证了在A6型中不可分解猜想成立，即投射函子作用于简单模要么输出不可分解模，要么输出零。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了对称群排列模式与李代数范畴O中简单模的Kostant性质之间的明确联系，并在A6型中取得了Kostant问题和不可分解猜想的完整解决方案，为进一步研究更高阶类型提供了重要基础。

title: Arithmetic level raising theorem for some unitary Shimura varieties mod $p$
comment: 58 pages. Some Typo fixed. Change the type of words. Try to shorten the length of paper as best as we can
summary: Let $F$ be a real quadratic field in which a fixed prime $p$ is inert, and $E_0$ be an imaginary quadratic field in which $p$ splits; put $E=E_0 F$. Let ${\rm Sh}_{1,n-1}$ be the special fiber over $\mathbb{F}_{p^2}$ of the Shimura variety for $G(U(1,n-1)\times U(n-1,1))$ with hyperspecial level structure at $p$ for some integer $n\geq 2$. Let ${\rm Sh}_{1,n-1}(K_{\mathfrak{p}}^{1})$ be the special fiber over $\mathbb{F}_{p^2}$ of a Shimura variety for $G(U(1,n-1)\times U(n-1,1))$ with parahoric level structure at $p$ for some integer $n\geq 2$. We exhibit elements in the higher Chow group of the supersingular locus of ${\rm Sh}_{1,n-1}$ and study the stratification of ${\rm Sh}_{1,n-1}.$ Moreover, we study the geometry of ${\rm Sh}_{1,n-1}(K_{\mathfrak{p}}^{1})$ and prove a form of Ihara lemma. With Ihara lemma, we prove the the arithmetic level raising map is surjective for $n=2,3.$

AI.tldr: 该论文研究实二次域和虚二次域上的Shimura簇的几何性质，在p为惰性/分裂的不同条件下，分析超特殊和抛物型水平结构的特殊纤维，研究超奇异轨迹的高Chow群元素，证明Ihara引理形式，并推导算术水平提升映射的满射性。
AI.motivation: 研究实二次域F（p惰性）和虚二次域E_0（p分裂）构成的复合域E=E_0F上的Shimura簇几何。主要动机是理解这些Shimura簇在特殊纤维上的几何结构，特别是超奇异轨迹的性质，并建立Ihara引理以证明算术水平提升映射的满射性。
AI.method:
1. 构造Shimura簇的特殊纤维：对群G(U(1,n-1)×U(n-1,1))分别考虑超特殊水平结构和抛物型水平结构
2. 研究超奇异轨迹：在超特殊水平结构的Shimura簇中超奇异轨迹的高Chow群中构造特定元素
3. 几何分析：研究Sh_{1,n-1}的层化结构，分析Sh_{1,n-1}(K_𝔭^1)的几何性质
4. 证明Ihara引理：建立该几何背景下的Ihara引理形式
5. 应用：利用Ihara引理证明当n=2,3时算术水平提升映射是满射的
AI.result:
1. 在超特殊水平结构的Shimura簇Sh_{1,n-1}的超奇异轨迹的高Chow群中成功构造了特定元素
2. 完整描述了Sh_{1,n-1}的层化结构
3. 深入分析了抛物型水平结构Shimura簇Sh_{1,n-1}(K_𝔭^1)的几何性质
4. 证明了该几何背景下的Ihara引理形式
5. 应用Ihara引理证明了当n=2,3时，算术水平提升映射是满射的
AI.conclusion: 该论文成功建立了实二次域和虚二次域构成的复合域上Shimura簇的几何理论框架。通过构造超奇异轨迹的高Chow群元素、分析层化结构、研究抛物型水平结构的几何性质，最终证明了Ihara引理并应用于算术水平提升映射的满射性证明，为n=2,3的情形提供了完整的理论结果。

title: Counting points on generic character varieties
comment: Final Version. To appear in Mathematics Research Letters
summary: We count points on character varieties associated with punctured surfaces and regular semisimple generic conjugacy classes in reductive groups. We find that the number of points are palindromic polynomials. This suggests a $P=W$ conjecture for these varieties. We also count points on the corresponding additive character varieties and find that the number of points are also polynomials, which we conjecture have non-negative coefficients. These polynomials can be considered as the reductive analogues of the Kac polynomials of comet-shaped quivers.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了与穿孔曲面和约化群中正则半单一般共轭类相关的特征簇的点计数问题，发现点数是回文多项式，并提出了相应的P=W猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究穿孔曲面特征簇的点计数问题，探索这些计数多项式的特殊性质及其与P=W猜想的潜在联系。
AI.method: 通过计数与穿孔曲面和约化群中正则半单一般共轭类相关的特征簇的点数，分析这些计数多项式的数学性质。
AI.result: 发现特征簇的点数是回文多项式，这支持了P=W猜想；同时发现相应的加性特征簇的点数也是多项式，且推测具有非负系数。
AI.conclusion: 这些多项式可以视为彗星形箭图的Kac多项式的约化类比，为特征簇的计数理论和P=W猜想提供了新的证据和方向。

title: Cohen-Macaulay representations of Artin-Schelter Gorenstein algebras of dimension one
summary:
Tilting theory is one of the central tools in modern representation theory, in particular in the study of Cohen-Macaulay representations. We study Cohen-Macaulay representations of $\mathbb N$-graded Artin-Schelter Gorenstein algebras $A$ of dimension one, without assuming the connectedness condition. This framework covers a broad class of noncommutative Gorenstein rings, including classical $\mathbb N$-graded Gorenstein orders. We prove that the stable category $\underline{\mathsf{CM}}_0^{\mathbb Z}A$ admits a silting object if and only if $A_0$ has finite global dimension. In this case we give such a silting object explicitly. Assuming that $A$ is ring-indecomposable, we further show that $\underline{\mathsf{CM}}_0^{\mathbb Z}A$ admits a tilting object if and only if either $A$ is Artin-Schelter regular or the average Gorenstein parameter of $A$ is non-positive. These results generalize those of Buchweitz, Iyama, and Yamaura. We give two proofs of the second result: one via Orlov-type semiorthogonal decompositions, and the other via a direct calculation. As an application, we show that for a Gorenstein tiled order $A$, the category $\underline{\mathsf{CM}}^{\mathbb Z}A$ is equivalent to the derived category of the incidence algebra of an explicitly constructed poset.
  We also apply our results and Koszul duality to study smooth noncommutative projective quadric hypersurfaces $\mathsf{qgr}\,B$ of arbitrary dimension. We prove that $\mathsf{D}^{\mathrm b}(\mathsf{qgr}\,B)$ admits an explicitly constructed tilting object, which contains the tilting object of $\underline{\mathsf{CM}}^{\mathbb Z}B$ due to Smith and Van den Bergh as a direct summand via Orlov's semiorthogonal decomposition.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了非交换Gorenstein代数的Cohen-Macaulay表示，证明了稳定范畴存在silting对象的充要条件，并给出了tilting对象的分类。结果推广了Buchweitz、Iyama和Yamaura的工作，并应用于非交换射影二次超曲面。
AI.motivation: 研究非交换Gorenstein代数的Cohen-Macaulay表示理论，特别是tilting理论在这些代数中的应用。旨在推广经典结果到更广泛的非交换Gorenstein环类，包括不满足连通性条件的代数。
AI.method: 采用tilting理论方法，研究N-分次Artin-Schelter Gorenstein代数的Cohen-Macaulay表示。通过Orlov型半正交分解和直接计算两种方法证明主要结果。应用Koszul对偶研究非交换射影二次超曲面。
AI.result: 1. 稳定范畴CM_0^Z A存在silting对象当且仅当A_0有有限整体维数，并给出了显式构造。2. 当A环不可分解时，该范畴存在tilting对象当且仅当A是Artin-Schelter正则或其平均Gorenstein参数非正。3. 对于Gorenstein平铺阶，证明了CM^Z A等价于某个偏序集关联代数的导出范畴。4. 对于非交换射影二次超曲面，证明了其有界导出范畴存在显式构造的tilting对象。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了非交换Gorenstein代数Cohen-Macaulay表示中tilting理论的系统框架，推广了经典结果，并为非交换几何中的表示论问题提供了新的工具和视角。特别是对非交换射影二次超曲面的研究展示了这些理论的实际应用价值。

title: Analytic holonomicity of real C$^{\mathrm{exp}}$-class distributions
comment: Proposition 3.13 gets a new, corrected proof in the new section 4 on algebraic holonomicity. To appear in Trans. Amer. Math. Soc
summary: We introduce a notion of distributions on $\mathbb{R}^n$, called distributions of C$^{\mathrm{exp}}$-class, based on wavelet transforms of distributions and the theory from Cluckers, Comte, Miller, Rolin, Servi (2018) about C$^{\mathrm{exp}}$-class functions. We prove that the framework of C$^{\mathrm{exp}}$-class distributions is closed under natural operations, like push-forward, pull-back, derivation and anti-derivation, and, in the tempered case, Fourier transforms. Our main result is the (real analytic) holonomicity of all distributions of C$^{\mathrm{exp}}$-class.

AI.tldr: 论文引入了基于小波变换和C^exp类函数理论的C^exp类分布概念，证明了这类分布在自然运算下的封闭性，并证明了所有C^exp类分布都是实解析全纯的。
AI.motivation: 为了建立一种新的分布理论框架，结合小波变换和C^exp类函数理论，研究分布的性质和运算封闭性。
AI.method: 基于Cluckers等人关于C^exp类函数的工作，通过小波变换定义C^exp类分布，并研究其在推前、拉回、微分、反微分等运算下的封闭性。
AI.result: 证明了C^exp类分布框架在自然运算下是封闭的，包括推前、拉回、微分、反微分，以及在缓增情况下的傅里叶变换。主要结果是所有C^exp类分布都是实解析全纯的。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了一个新的分布理论框架，该框架具有良好的运算封闭性和解析性质，为分布理论的研究提供了新的工具和方法。

title: Quasimaps to quivers with potentials
comment: 86 pages. Published version, to appear in Mem. Amer. Math. Soc
summary:
This paper is concerned with a non-compact GIT quotient of a vector space, in the presence of an abelian group action and an equivariant regular function (potential) on the quotient. We define virtual counts of quasimaps from prestable curves to the critical locus of the potential, and prove a gluing formula in the formalism of cohomological field theories.
  The main examples studied in this paper is when the above setting arises from quivers with potentials, where the above construction gives quantum correction to the equivariant Chow homology of the critical locus. Following similar ideas as in quasimaps to Nakajima quiver varieties studied by the Okounkov school, we analyse vertex functions in several examples, including Hilbert schemes of points on $\mathbb{C}^3$, moduli spaces of perverse coherent systems on the resolved conifold, and a quiver which defines higher $\mathfrak{sl}_2$-spin chains. Bethe equations are calculated in these cases.
  The construction in the present paper is based on the theory of gauged linear sigma models as well as shifted symplectic geometry of Pantev, Toën, Vaquie and Vezzosi, and uses the virtual pullback formalism of symmetric obstruction theory of Park, which arises from the recent development of Donaldson-Thomas theory of Calabi-Yau 4-folds.

AI.tldr: 本文研究非紧GIT商空间上的拟映射虚拟计数，建立余调场论框架下的粘合公式，应用于带势的箭图，计算顶点函数和Bethe方程。
AI.motivation: 研究带势箭图的非紧GIT商空间，建立拟映射到势临界轨迹的虚拟计数理论，为Nakajima箭图簇的拟映射理论提供推广，应用于Calabi-Yau 4-折叠的Donaldson-Thomas理论。
AI.method: 使用规范线性σ模型理论和Pantev-Toën-Vaquie-Vezzosi的平移辛几何，结合Park的对称障碍理论虚拟拉回形式化方法，定义拟映射到势临界轨迹的虚拟计数。
AI.result: 建立了拟映射虚拟计数的余调场论粘合公式，计算了多个例子的顶点函数和Bethe方程，包括C^3上的Hilbert概型、resolved conifold上的反常凝聚系统模空间，以及定义高阶sl_2-自旋链的箭图。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展了非紧GIT商空间上带势系统的拟映射理论，为箭图势临界轨迹的等变Chow同调提供了量子修正，连接了规范线性σ模型、平移辛几何和Donaldson-Thomas理论。

title: Branching rules for winding subalgebras of the affine Kac--Moody algebras $A^{(1)}_1$ and $A^{(2)}_2$
summary: We study branching problems for affine Kac--Moody algebras. Unlike the finite-dimensional case, an affine Kac--Moody algebra may contain proper subalgebras isomorphic to itself, such as winding subalgebras obtained by rescaling the loop parameter. We investigate the restriction of integrable highest-weight representations to such subalgebras. The restriction remains integrable and decomposes into irreducible components with finite multiplicities, encoded by pairs of highest weights. We show that this set is closed under addition, extending a result of Brion and Knop to the affine setting. We also give a partial description of this set and provide explicit results for types $A^{(1)}_1$ and $A^{(2)}_2$.

AI.tldr: 研究仿射Kac-Moody代数的分支问题，特别是可积最高权表示在自身同构子代数上的限制分解
AI.motivation: 与有限维情况不同，仿射Kac-Moody代数可能包含与自身同构的真子代数（如通过重标定环参数得到的缠绕子代数），这引发了对其表示限制分解的研究兴趣
AI.method: 研究可积最高权表示在缠绕子代数等自身同构子代数上的限制，分析其分解为不可约分量且具有有限重数的情况，用最高权对编码分解结构
AI.result: 证明了限制表示仍保持可积性，且分解为具有有限重数的不可约分量；证明了该集合在加法下封闭，将Brion和Knop的结果推广到仿射情形；对类型A^{(1)}_1和A^{(2)}_2给出了明确结果
AI.conclusion: 成功将有限维李代数的分支问题结果扩展到仿射Kac-Moody代数，建立了限制分解的基本性质，为仿射代数的表示论研究提供了新工具
